programme.title: Bola Kampung Xtreme Ep08
programme.desc: Kisah ini tentang sekumpulan budak di Kampung Gong Lechar yang minat terhadap bola sepak sehingga pengetua sekolah Encik Daud dan jurulatih Encik Abdul Rahman membuat keputusan.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fusion Ep20
programme.desc: Gingka dan rakan-rakannya pergi ke Beyblade Island untuk menyertai pertandingan Survival Battle.

programme.title: Tsurupika Hagemaru Ep38
programme.desc: Hagemaru merupakan anak tunggal keluarga Hageta yang kedekut dan sering mencari jalan untuk berjimat-cermat dalam pembelanjaan.

programme.title: New Doraemon Ep138
programme.desc: Siri terbaharu Doraemon, sebuah kucing robot bersama Nobita serta rakan-rakannya dalam menjalani kehidupan harian yang penuh aksi yang melucukan.

programme.title: SMK S2 Ep01
programme.desc: Adam dan Mal melanggar peraturan kelas dengan bermain bola sepak di dalam kelas dan Mal ditangkap. Adakah Adam akan mengakui kesalahannya atau membiarkan Mal dihukum seorang diri?

programme.title: Family Spy Ep03
programme.desc: Dengan bantuan Ejen Mah, Roz kembali beraksi setelah lama bersara, untuk menyelamatkan cucunya Rin. Roz tiba di lokasi yang disangkakan Rin ada di situ, tetapi Roz diserang. Siapakah penyerang itu?

programme.title: Kampung Boy S2 Ep05
programme.desc: Nikmati animasi terbaik hasil nukilan Dato' Lat yang penuh kreatif lagi menghiburkan ini istimewa untuk tontonan anda sekeluarga!

programme.title: Rimau Bangku Ep02
programme.desc: Azman ingin menjadi pemain bola sepak negara namun sering kali usahanya itu diperlekehkan oleh rakan-rakannya.

programme.title: Ultraman Z Ep04
programme.desc: Haruki Natsukawan ialah seorang juruterbang di unit robot Global Allied Forces Japan 'STORAGE'. Semasa Haruki bekerja untuk menjaga keamanan di Bumi, seorang Ultra Hero muncul iaitu Ultraman Z. Z

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fusion Ep14
programme.desc: Ayah Gingka, Ryo, ialah pemilik asal bey Pegasus dan ditewaskan oleh Ryuga dan lightning L-Drago.

programme.title: Spicy Killers
programme.desc: Kisah ibu dan 3 anak perempuannya yang hidup diselubungi ketakutan akibat didera oleh ayah mereka menyebabkan kehidupan mereka penuh dengan dendam dan tragedi berdarah.

programme.title: Sneak Peek i-Tanggang Ep20
programme.desc: Sneak Peek episod 8. Saksikan 'i-Tanggang' setiap Isnin pukul 9 malam di Astro Citra saluran 108.

programme.title: Strawberi Cinta
programme.desc: Ichigo yang datang ke Malaysia untuk mencari sesuatu, bertemu dengan Hakimi, seorang pemandu pelancong. Dapatkah Ichigo bertemu dengan apa yang dicari?

programme.title: Kamar Seksa
programme.desc: 2 kisah di dalam 1 filem. Kisah pertama mengenai pembantu rumah cuba untuk melepaskan diri dari majikannya. Kisah kedua mengenai isteri yang perlu bekerja menampung keluarga selepas suaminya dibuang kerja.

programme.title: Karya 12-Wau Kasih
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kisah pengorbanan seorang ayah untuk membantu keluarga namun ianya disalah erti oleh anak-anaknya.

programme.title: Rendang Krispi'e
programme.desc: Chef Syafi'e taksub dengan sebilah keris yang dia percayai rahsia di sebalik resipi rendangnya yang enak. Kekecohan berlaku setelah keris itu hilang semasa dia menyertai sebuah pertandingan memasak.

programme.title: Kupilih Jalanku Sendiri
programme.desc: Rafazah seorang peguam pencegah rasuah tetapi ternyata bapa mertuanya terlibat dalam rasuah yang akan mempertaruhkan nama baiknya. Mampukah Rafazah berhadapan dengan masalah tersebut?

programme.title: I'm Not Single
programme.desc: Sebuah filem komedi romantik tentang hubungan suami isteri Adam dan Maya yang dipaksa berkahwin pada usia yang masih muda. Dibintangi oleh Farid Kamil dan Lisa Surihani.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Special Clip i-Tanggang Ep07
programme.desc: Special Clip episod 8. Saksikan drama bersiri i-Tanggang setiap Isnin, 9 malam di saluran Astro Citra 108.

programme.title: The Closed Ward
programme.desc: Sekumpulan orang terperangkap secara misteri di sebuah hospital yang ditinggalkan, tanpa tahu nasib apa yang akan menanti mereka.

programme.title: Sneak Peek i-Tanggang Ep20

programme.title: Tentang Bulan
programme.desc: Persahabatan antara lima sahabat sekampong, Asmawi, Bulat, Ketot, Budi dan Illa tergugat dengan ketibaan Zurina dari kota.

programme.title: Dollah Superstar
programme.desc: Dollah sering berangan menjadi pelakon terkenal walaupun hanyalah seorang gengster veteran. Akhirnya impian Dollah tercapai apabila seorang pelakon popular bernama Shah Dazzle meminta dirinya menjadi mento

programme.title: Sneak Peek i-Tanggang Ep19
programme.desc: Sneak Peek episod 8. Saksikan 'i-Tanggang' setiap Isnin pukul 9 malam di Astro Citra saluran 108.

programme.title: Dolla
programme.desc: Sabrina, Tabby, Angel dan Sasha ingin mencapai cita-cita dan minat mereka dalam bidang Muzik. Namun, mereka terpaksa mengharungi dugaan demi untuk mencapai impian mereka.

programme.title: i-Tanggang Ep07
programme.desc: Erma mengunci Khalil di dalam bilik stor selepas mendapat tahu tentang persahabatannya dengan Esra dan Syafiq. Syafiq pula menerima panggilan telefon yang merisaukan dari rumahnya.

programme.title: Citra Exclusive : Hantu Ustazah Supiah
programme.desc: Ustazah Supiah sering dibuli oleh anak muridnya sehingga satu hari, dia hilang sabar dan menghilangkan diri. Suatu hari Ustazah Supiah kembali sebagai hantu dan mengganggu mereka semua.

programme.title: Kafir
programme.desc: Separuh jiwa Sri tersimpan pada suaminya. Namun, setelah suaminya meninggal, Sri diganggu oleh pelbagai misteri yang membuatkan hidupnya porak-peranda.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: Penduduk kawasan setinggan menjadi mangsa gangguan hantu dari sebuah kubur tentera jepun. Antara yang menjadi mangsa gangguan ialah keluarga Pak Sudin. Burn dan 3 orang anak gadis.

programme.title: Kalbu Pun Berzikir
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu tunggal yang sanggup bekorban dan bekerja keras untuk membesarkan anak-anaknya. Kesempitan hidup mereka diduga apabila anak perempuannya disahkan mengidap barah.

programme.title: Karya 12-Pangkalan Batu 6
programme.desc: Kisah cinta singkat antara Mimi dan Li Sepila yang bertemu di sebuah pangkalan bertukar menjadi tragedi apabila identiti sebenar mereka mula terbongkar...

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: Anak Kerak
programme.desc: Husin telah menggunakan ilmu hitam iaitu dengan memuja 'Anak Kerak' demi untuk mendapatkan kekebalan, kesenangan dan kemewahan hidup di dunia

programme.title: Sepenggal Puisi Ep03
programme.desc: Rahsia yang di simpan selama 30 tahun akhirnya terbongkar dan menimbulkan konflik dalam 2 buah keluarga yang berada di Kuala Lumpur dan juga Yogyakarta.

programme.title: Bikers Kental

programme.title: Dilan 1990
programme.desc: Perkenalan luar biasa Milea dan Dilan akhirnya bertukar menjadi perasaan cinta. Mampukah mereka mengharungi dugaan untuk terus kekal bersama.

programme.title: Rabun
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri telah berpindah dari bandar ke kawasan luar bandar kerana rimas dengan kesibukkan hidup di sana. Namun, ketenangan hidup di luar bandar tidaklah seindah yang disangka.

programme.desc: Competitors including Jesse Labreck, Grant McCartney, Ethan Swanson, Michelle Warnky, 98 Degrees band member Drew Lachey and more face challenging obstacles, including the new Sling Shot.

programme.title: The Amazing Race S32 Ep03
programme.desc: Teams are in Manaus, Brazil where they have big decisions to make when they encounter the first U-turn of the Race.

programme.title: The Amazing Race S32 Ep04
programme.desc: Teams race through Asuncin, Paraguay when they compete in a series of switchback Detours, where they must either stack a pyramid of watermelons or perform a traditional Paraguayan bottle dance.

programme.title: MacGyver S5 Ep09
programme.desc: The team are unable to prevent Department of Defense intel from falling into Codex's hands, Mac must scale a vertical cliff using only gear he can cobble together himself to prevent the transmission.

programme.title: The Rookie S4 Ep01
programme.desc: Officer Nolan and the entire team race against the clock to locate Lopez after she is kidnapped on her wedding day, not only to save her life but her unborn child's.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawai'i S1 Ep01
programme.desc: An experimental Naval aircraft crashes on Oahu, and Tennant and her team must find who is behind it before classified state secrets are exposed.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Facing a threat that could bring down the Crime Lab and release thousands of convicted killers back onto the streets of Vegas, a team of investigators do what they do best, serve justice in Sin City.

programme.title: The Blacklist S9 Ep02
programme.desc: Following the death of Elizabeth Keen, Raymond Reddington and the members of the FBI Task Force have disbanded - their lives now changed in unexpected ways and with Reddington's whereabouts unknown.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles S12 Ep17
programme.desc: When a Naval Intelligence Officer is tortured and murdered, NCIS must work with Joelle, who informs them that other CIA operatives are being killed in the same way.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese
programme.desc: This 1972 cult classic stars Lily Ho in her most audacious role as a mysterious courtesan caught in a web of sex and murder with her powerful madam.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: This epic depicts the romance between the Jade Emperor's seventh daughter and a young village man. When Heaven and Earth meet, can a common ground be found?

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In this comedic sequel to the 36th Chamber of Shaolin, Gordon Liu is hired to impersonate the 36th Chamber's founder!

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: Catch this rare gem, a product of Hong Kong-style science fiction, complete with out-of-this-world visual effects.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Directed by Chang Cheh and starring Ti Lung in his first main role, this drama depicts how two lovers contend with family opposition and an unjust accusation.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Starring Chin Han, Wang Ping and Tsung Hua, this movie revolves around the challenges that beset three sworn brothers and sisters.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: In this chapter of the 'Journey to the West' saga, the Monkey King and his gang are confronted by a whole host of fanciful villains.

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: The retired one-armed swordsman made his reappearance to fight against the brutal robbers and protect the peace of the martial art world.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this sequel, the Mad Monk is joined by immortal scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin, as they both wreak havoc in an attempt to outdo each other!

programme.title: The Sword and the Lute
programme.desc: Kwei Wu and his partner go on a mission to destroy the Phoenix Lute, a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles and can only be destroyed by the Kan sword.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: Director Chan Friend joins award-winning social satirist Alfred Cheung Kin Ting in this delightful variation on the hugely successful British Carry On!

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Award-winning actor Ku Feng plays the cunning pirate Lei Chen-tien, flanked by Wan Ping who disguises herself as a boy to beat him to the treasure.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: The Shaw Brothers' directors created this 60's classic depicting a timeless romance between a wealthy man and a songbird.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin loyalists (led by Alexander Fu Sheng and Chen Kuan Tai) go up against a formidable Manchu general and his Tibetan allies.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel Water Margin and starring Ti Lung, this award-winning drama depicts how the courageous Wu Song defeats a tiger, and his bond with Wu Da Lang.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Share the adventures of patriot Chu Tieh-hsieh and his three comrades, who head out with the aim of 'relieving' Mongolian invaders of their ill-gotten gains.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: This hard-hitting drama is based on a real-life investigation on the involvement of both cops as well as crooks in second offences.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: Death and destruction are the order of the day after a bandit's daughter learns some painful truths about her past.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: Shu Pei-pei shines in this production alongside hero Yueh Hua, her stalwart companion, in a battle to rid their town of killers and thieves.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: When an argument gets out of hand between a regular Joe and a wealthy businessman, regular Joe finds himself thrust into the middle of a high stakes wager!

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu Lan
programme.desc: A young woman joins the army in place of her old, ailing father and only when she returns home is the truth revealed.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho stars in this movie as a revenge seeking gun-for-hire who always gets her man in more ways than one!

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: In this 'Brave Archer' sequel, Kuo Tsing's (Alexander Fu Sheng) love for Huang Yung (Niu Niu) is challenged by Ouyang Fung.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu, who is trying to shed his criminal side, instead finds himself caught up in an all-out gang war that comes to a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: When a swordswoman falters in her attempt to reclaim her murdered husband's 'Green Sword,' the world's sharpest blade, her protg continues her quest.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Two lovers who return to announce their marriage plans discover that their families are in conflict over land. Can they mend this broken bond?

programme.title: Killers on Wheels
programme.desc: While taking a ferry on the way to a vacation, Kwok and his family meet a road thug who puts an ugly spin on their holiday plans.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: This three-film anthology collectively offers up a captivating examination of human obsession and love.

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2012
programme.desc: This beloved slapstick comedy series continues with four men on a heroic mission to help four women and wind up experiencing a series of mishaps.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: These compilation of two Hong Kong urban love stories depicts how two Hong Kong policemen - both jilted by ex-lovers - find love again in unexpected places.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow
programme.desc: John Woo took his place as one of Hong Kong's premiere action directors with this slick action classic that immortalized Chow Yun Fat, Ti Lung & Leslie Cheung.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: A self-assured chief inspector begins to second-guess himself after a fainting spell damages his short-term memory - and indicates he may be a serial killer.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: In order to meet his girlfriend's financial ultimatum, Siu Long decides to flip a penthouse. However, he ends up living with the other three investors when things go south.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: Adapted from a true story about a talented blind pianist who meets a talented amateur dancer, this drama captures a journey to their dreams.

programme.title: Wolf Warriors 2
programme.desc: USD800m! Wu Jing powers Asian cinema to break into the world's top 100 grossing films for the first time with this global box-office hit!

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An accident at an offshore drilling platform results in the call for the Transportation Emergency Response Team to save the survivors before the site collapses.

programme.title: Cross
programme.desc: Starring Simon Yam, Nick Cheung & Liu Kai Chi, this disturbing tale depicts how a man, whose wife commits suicide, takes it upon himself to free people from their pain by killing them

programme.title: The Mafia Lady
programme.desc: A young cop, who vows revenge on his parents' murderer, discovers that one of the key assassins is his sister. How will this affect his vendetta?

programme.title: 77 Heartbreaks
programme.desc: When Eva ends her ten-year relationship with Adam, he's shocked by the seeming suddenness of the break-up till reading her private journal reveals it was the culmination of 77 heartbreaks.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: As the Tang Dynasty declines, several rebel groups are established, with the largest being the House of Flying Daggers. Two officers are ordered to kill the elusive leader of the group.

programme.title: To Love or Not to Love
programme.desc: Casey had her heart broken by her high school boyfriend, Elton. Three years later, Casey now much choose between the perfect guy, Adam and Elton as the truth behind Elton's betrayal is revealed.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: Winner of the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival. A shoplifter comes across a little girl in the freezing cold, whom his wife agrees to take in. But what secrets is the girl hiding?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: When an extreme sports enthusiast is mistaken as a triad member, he soon finds himself in Budapest alongside an agent & three other individual in a war against terrorism.

programme.title: Who Killed Cock Robin
programme.desc: A Taiwanese crime masterpiece not to be missed! An investigation into a long-forgotten accident reveals an unimaginable dark truth.

programme.title: As the Light Goes Out
programme.desc: When a liquor warehouse fire threatens to plunge the whole of Hong Kong into darkness upon reaching a nearby power plant, can firefighters avert this disaster?

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2012
programme.desc: Featuring an all HK-star cast, this movie depicts how a weatherman is faced with the biggest challenge of his life when he receives a shocking forecast.

programme.title: Love Revolution
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 9th Okinawa International Movie Festival, Sam Lee's action romance depicts a spirited woman who sets out to rescue her dope-running boyfriend, when he is kidnapped in Thailand.

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men lead a reckless life - but when people start turning into zombies across the city, they take on the responsibility of braving the infected district to save others.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: A young emperor & his cross-dressing sister, and a restaurant-owning wanderer & his sibling descends into a swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics & romance.

programme.title: It: Chapter 2
programme.desc: 27 years after he was defeated, Pennywise is back to terrorise the town of Derry. Now adults, the Losers have to come together to conquer their deepest fears and destroy Pennywise once and for all.

programme.title: Just Go With it
programme.desc: A man enlists the help of a woman and her kids to land the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep934
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Curious George: Go West, Go Wild
programme.desc: George and Ted travel to cousin Ginny's farm for a relaxing outdoor weekend, but plans take a turn when her farm animals escape into the wild blue yonder.

programme.title: Atonement
programme.desc: When a young child falsely accuses a man of a crime he did not commit, it sets off a chain of events that alter the lives of her loved ones forever.

programme.title: The Marksman
programme.desc: When an ex-marine witnesses a young migrant fleeing from drug cartel assassins, the two hit the road together with the group of killers in pursuit and slowly forge an unlikely friendship.

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: As team leader, O'Hara leads a squad of soldiers to rescue hostages in remote Africa. The mission goes awry when they face a brutal encounter with a gang of rebels and a horde of enraged lions.

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: A pilot miraculously lands his plane after a catastrophe, but gets questioned about the cause of it all.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: A couple proves that true love is strong enough to withstand the brutal tests of memory and time.

programme.title: E.T.
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's classic tells the story of how a little boy tries to help a stranded alien return home when it is accidentally left stranded on Earth.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Harrison Ford is back as Indy in this new globe-trotting adventure, as he tries to find the secret behind the mysterious Crystal Skull.

programme.title: It: Chapter 2
programme.desc: 27 years after he was defeated, Pennywise is back to terrorise the town of Derry. Now adults, the Losers have to come together to conquer their deepest fears and destroy Pennywise once and for all.

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, 'All My Life' follows a young couple (Jessica Rothe and Harry Shum Jr.) who are planning their wedding even after the groom's devastating cancer diagnosis.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep934
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: A veteran investigating the bizarre murder of a fellow officer discovers a mysterious figure in the body cam footage. She suspects something supernatural is targeting the cops in her unit.

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: As team leader, O'Hara leads a squad of soldiers to rescue hostages in remote Africa. The mission goes awry when they face a brutal encounter with a gang of rebels and a horde of enraged lions.

programme.title: The Spongebob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: SpongeBob travels to our world to locate a burger recipe stolen by a pirate.

programme.title: E.T.
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's classic tells the story of how a little boy tries to help a stranded alien return home when it is accidentally left stranded on Earth.

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Paris, an orphan who lives in the walls of a train station is wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

programme.title: Spontaneous
programme.desc: When students inexplicably start to explode, Mara and her friends stay close together as they await possible combustion - wondering what part of life is worth living if it might end suddenly.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: With the law enforcement closing in, a math savant who works with criminal organisations takes on a legitimate client only to find a discrepancy in their books.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Harrison Ford is back as Indy in this new globe-trotting adventure, as he tries to find the secret behind the mysterious Crystal Skull.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An epic action-adventure with a breathtaking new vision of the legendary tale of Snow White.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The (mis)adventures of Sonic as he navigates the complexities of life on Earth with his new human best friend. Together, they must stop Dr. Robotnik from using Sonic's immense powers for world domination.

programme.title: Come Away
programme.desc: Highly creative origin story of Peter Pan and Alice In Wonderland as siblings who, trying to save their parents from despair, choose between home and imagination.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: An international naval coalition becomes the world's last hope for survival as they engage a hostile alien force in this epic action-adventure.

programme.desc: It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all of their friends are excited to 'Truck or Treat.' But when Crusher's plan to steal all of their candy goes awry, he sends their treats far away.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S5 Ep516
programme.desc: It's Halloween in Adventure Bay, and a mysterious kid in a giant spider costume is taking all the treats from the Trick-Or-Treaters!

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe S1 Ep114
programme.desc: It's Halloween! The Bean Team is prepping for their big party but spooky things keep happening around the Cafe. Cricket is convinced it's a ghost until she realizes it's really a cute kitty with wings!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway's purse chicken 'Chickaletta' has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep513
programme.desc: When supervillain Lady Goo Goo starts changing everyone into babies, it's up to Guppy Girl and Bubble Boy to stop her before they get turned into babies too!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Clues house! While playing 'superheroes' we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends but it's not yet finished. We play Blue's Clues to find out who else Blue wants to add to her painting and skidoo to help out our color friends!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are helping their friend Stripes look after baby animals, when the little critters accidentally float away on big bubbles. It's up to these three babysitters to find them and save the day!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep109
programme.desc: When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S4 Ep411
programme.desc: Pups need to lure a big ape onto the PAW Patroller so they can take him back to the jungle. // Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but to master them, Paddington must practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill but Paddington is here to help with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep240
programme.desc: Suzy Sheep's pretend friend is called 'Leo Lion'. Peppa can't see Leo but Suzy says he likes to roar and dressup. Peppa decides that she can see Leo. Mummy and Daddy Pig play along, George feels left out.

programme.title: Broken

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo joins an elite team formed by a gangster-turned-investor who attempt their biggest scam to swindle $60,000,000 from the stock market.

programme.title: Modern Boy
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese rule, a Korean civil servant with an extravagant lifestyle falls in love with a bar singer who turns out to be a member of the Korean independence movement.

programme.title: A Girl at My Door
programme.desc: A policewoman encounters a young girl in need of help but things become more mysterious as she gets to know her.

programme.title: Long Live the King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 1 the Subversion
programme.desc: A young girl escaped from a government facility and lost all her memory. Years later, when she appears on a nationally televised show, mysterious faces from her past life reappear.

programme.title: Too Hot to Die
programme.desc: Three men who've made a pact to commit suicide plan their last night out but things change when a beautiful woman appears in front of them.

programme.title: The Classic
programme.desc: Ji-hae writes a love letter for her friend to a boy they both have a crush on. As the boy falls in love with her letters, she discovers that her mother also had a similar romance in the past.

programme.title: Hwayi: a Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: Memories of the Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Blood and Ties
programme.desc: A journalist suspects that her doting father may have been the culprit in a child abduction case 15 years ago, which the statute of limitations is set to expire soon.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: Rv: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Surreal cases are reported globally where victims come back to life to avenge the murderer. One day, prosecutor Jin-hong's dead mother returns home and tries to kill him...

programme.title: Parallel Life
programme.desc: After his wife is brutally murdered, a judge discovers that his life bears an eerie resemblance to that of a long-ago predecessor.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is an Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other's backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: Queen of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Underground Rendezvous
programme.desc: A series of disasters in the big city bring an aspiring teacher to a small town where he falls in love with a girl whose origins are mysterious.

programme.title: Lover'S Concerto
programme.desc: Anonymous love letters keep coming to Ji-hwan, refreshing his memories 5 years ago of two long-lost best friends, but when love rushed in, who will be left behind?

programme.title: Broken
